topic.title: Number of Births Now Living - conformance rules

lines.i: The total number of previous live-born infants now living. For multiple deliveries include all live-born infants before this infant in the pregnancy. If the first born, do not include this infant.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.36"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:208)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:209)/@code="11638-4" Births still living (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - it contains the total number of previous live-born infants now living.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT (CONF:211)
The total number of previous live-born infants now living. The entry is a non-negative integer within the range from zero to 30.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:208)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:209)/@code="11638-4" Births still living (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - it contains the total number of previous live-born infants now living.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT (CONF:211)
The total number of previous live-born infants now living. The entry is a non-negative integer within the range from zero to 30.

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="OBS"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.36"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="895579929"/> <code code="11638-4" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Births still living"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="INT" value="1"/> </observation>
